meanings.definition: A taste that lingers after the food or drink has been swallowed.
meanings.sent1: The aftertaste of the spicy curry stayed in my mouth for a while.
meanings.sent2: I could still taste the aftertaste of the lemonade long after finishing the glass.
meanings.sent3: The aftertaste of the burnt popcorn made me regret not paying attention to the microwave timer.
meanings.sent4: The aftertaste of betrayal lingered in her mind, souring her trust in others.
meanings.sent5: The aftertaste of victory was sweet, fueling his desire for more success.

meanings.definition: The lingering impression or effect of something experienced.
meanings.sent1: The aftertaste of fear from the horror movie made me check under the bed before sleeping.
meanings.sent2: The aftertaste of excitement from the roller coaster ride stayed with me all day.
meanings.sent3: The aftertaste of the joke left everyone chuckling long after the punchline.
meanings.sent4: The aftertaste of nostalgia flooded her heart with memories of childhood summers.
meanings.sent5: The aftertaste of disappointment in his voice was palpable, leaving a heavy atmosphere in the room.
